MainText: We don't just create projects, we create new opportunities. By building state-scale facilities, we are building the future. We care about the environment:
aboutText: We don't just create projects, we create new opportunities. By building state-scale facilities, we are building the future. We care about the environment: the company takes full responsibility for the environmental aspects related to the construction and operation of buildings and infrastructure.
advantagesCardText: The company recruits experienced employees on a competitive basis
advantagesCardText2: By looking at the great work we have done through our website, you will be sure that we have earned the trust of our customers
advantagesCardText3: We perform our mission carefully and appreciate your belief in our company All mistakes were clearly corrected
ProjectsText: Magic city is a large socially significant project. The cultural and entertainment cluster in Tashkent is one of the new attractions.
ProjectsText2: A multifunctional residential complex created to provide comfort to the residents of Uzbekistan.
ProjectsText3: A grandiose residential quarter in the heart of the capital.
ProjectsText4: Fonon is a jewelry factory in Uzbekistan built on the basis of Italian ones in 2020. Fonon is the only large enterprise in Central Asia producing jewelry made of precious metals in European and Oriental style.
ProjectsText5: International kindergarten and school located in the international business center Tashkent City
ProjectsText6: The Presidential School is a specialized public educational institution whose activities are aimed at identifying and educating gifted children to train highly qualified specialists.

contactText: Leave your contacts by filling out the current form and we will contact you as soon as possible.

contactQuestionTitle: Leave your contacts by filling out the current form and we will contact you as soon as possible.
aboutMissionText: Our mission We introduce the most advanced technologies in construction in Uzbekistan and create modern design solutions. Relying on first-class workers, we build affordable housing and industrial buildings for many years.
aboutVisionText: Creation of the best project company in Central Asia, which provides an opportunity to: - Society - to improve the standard of living of people by setting high standards in work. - Clients - to enjoy joint activities, to build long-term and open relationships. - Employees - constant growth,
aboutValueText: Our values Since the founding (LLC) 'Discover Invest' in 2008, we have been working only with professionals. Our specialists use advanced technologies and an innovative approach to business.Regardless of the time and place of operation, we remain committed to our values: staff and safety, continuous improvement and the trust of our customers.
car2008: In 2008 the construction company Discover Invest was established.
car2009: In 2009 working on project began at the first construction site. It was a factory for the production of aluminum profiles.
car2011: In 2011 the need for a car park arose and was built so everyone can imagine how big the company is.
car2013: In 2013 the design and architecture department was formed.
